mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ITEM_STATS_MONTHLY(YEAR, MONTH, MERCHANT_NAME, ITEM_NAME, SUM_ITEM_PRICE, SUM_TAX, SUM_TOTAL) VALUES (#{year}, #{month}, #{merchantName}, #{itemName}, #{sumItemPrice}, #{sumTax}, #{sumTotal})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM TB_ITEM_STATS_MONTHLY WHERE 1 = 1
AND MERCHANT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{merchantName}, '%')
AND ITEM_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{itemName}, '%')
AND YEAR = #{year}
